name: Love & Romance
description: Celebrate love and heartfelt moments with flowers and gifts that express your affection and romance.

name: Celebrations
description: Make every special occasion memorable with thoughtful gifts, flowers, and treats to celebrate birthdays, achievements, and milestones.

name: Flowers
description: Brighten up any moment with our exquisite selection of flowers, bouquets, and plants for every taste and style.

name: Sympathy & Condolence
description: Express your care and support with heartfelt floral arrangements and messages during difficult times.

name: Christmas
description: Spread joy and festive cheer with our specially curated holiday bouquets, gift sets, and Christmas specials.
